title: That’s Not a Saudi Prince, But Imam Tawhidi Speaking on Kashmir
subtitle: A viral video on social media shows an Imam sitting on a stage, speaking on the Kashmir issue, where he admits that ‘Kashmir is Hindu Land’.
author: www.thequint.com
vclaim:
The person in the video is not a Saudi prince, but Imam Tawhidi – an Iranian-born Australian Shia Muslim Imam. He was in India recently to participate in the Arth Fest of art and culture, held in Delhi.

In fact, the entire video of his talk can be accessed on Arth's Youtube page. According to the original video, the Imam had made these comments in response to an audience member's question on the interpretation of the Quran by different cultures in light of the 'wahabisation' of Muslims in Kashmir.

The question and the Imam's subsequent answer can be seen at 54:20 minutes in the video below.
